bootstrap.title: Getting Ready
bootstrap.message: Welcome! I'm getting ready to walk you through the basics.

welcome.greeting: Hi! I'm Jack, your AI hospitality assistant.
welcome.welcomeBack: Welcome back! Let's continue where we left off.
welcome.confirmation: Perfect! I'll remember that {{name}} is a {{type}}.
welcome.nextStep: Now let's set up my brain.

aiProvider.title: Set Up AI
aiProvider.recommendation: For the best experience, I recommend using Claude or OpenAI. They handle complex guest requests much better.
aiProvider.canChangeLater: You can change this anytime in Settings > Apps
aiProvider.askApiKey: Great choice! Please enter your {{provider}} API key.
aiProvider.localSelected: Perfect! I'll use my local brain. It's more private, works offline, and you can upgrade anytime in Settings.
aiProvider.configured: {{provider}} is now connected! You're all set.
aiProvider.getKey: How do I get a key?
aiProvider.step3Anthropic: Go to API Keys and create a new key
aiProvider.step3Openai: Go to API Keys and create a new key
aiProvider.freeCredits: Both providers offer free credits to start.
aiProvider.localSuccess: Staying with Local AI. You can upgrade anytime.
aiProvider.error: Failed to connect. Please check your API key.

knowledge.askWebsite: What's your website? I'll learn about your property from there.
knowledge.foundItems: Found {{count}} pieces of information from your website.
knowledge.foundItemsWithDuplicates: Found {{count}} new pieces of information ({{duplicates}} duplicates skipped).
knowledge.noContent: I couldn't find much content on that page. Try a different URL or tell me directly.
knowledge.errorFetching: I couldn't access that website. Please check the URL and try again.

checklist.title: Knowledge Found
checklist.description: Here's what I found. You can always update this in Settings after login.

knowledge.askCheckin: What are your check-in and check-out times?
knowledge.askRoomType: Tell me about one of your room types (name, features, price range).
knowledge.askContact: What's the best way for guests to contact you? (phone, email, address)
knowledge.savedItem: Got it! I've saved that information.
knowledge.allRequired: I have all the essential information. Now let's create your admin account.

admin.askCredentials: Let's create your admin account. You'll use this to log in.
admin.title: Create Admin Account
admin.description: This will be your login for the dashboard
admin.success: Your account is ready! Redirecting to login...
admin.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
